DataElement.preferredName: Treatment Cycle Submitted Adverse Drug Experience Report Begin Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the begin date of the treatment cycle during which an adverse drug experience report was submitted.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Treatment Cycle Submitted Adverse Drug Experience Report
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the treatment cycle during which an adverse drug experience report was submitted.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.:An event or sequence of events that constitute round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence.

Concepts.definition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.
An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence.

Property.preferredDefinition: Submitted; referred for judgment or consideration.:Written notification to the FDA that a subject in a study has experienced an adverse event.

Concepts.definition: The act of referring for judgment or consideration by others; the act of handing over something.
Written notification to the FDA that a subject has experienced an adverse event.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation or an event began.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense.:a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.
The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/23/17 jk transferred context, cap first letter in def, and added CSI, registration status per Round 5 finalization task.
